name: Silvi
description:
Every 10 seconds the plant grows. Meanwhile, you can use your tools to shape it!

Enjoy the little story, and shape plants for a nice little couple~

Or just relax and shape a random type of plant your own way!

See below for instructions on shaping!

Ignore unity's warning - it can work on mobile!

If the plant doesn't show up, try another browser. Once I'm able to reproduce the issue I'll fix it!
